issue.title: Specialization of <type_trait> variable templates should be prohibited

discussion.p: /1 only prohibits adding specializations of class templates in <type_trait>. Now that we have _v variable templates, this prohibition should apply to them as well.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4567.

blockquote.p: -1- The behavior of a program that adds specializations for any of the class templates defined in this subclause is undefined unless otherwise specified.
